name: Treatment Library
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" x 2 #L "Pharma Tech Tutoring Device" "55682" #L "Portable Surgery Clinic" "43551" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Pharma Tech Tutoring Device = #L "Hacked Pharma Tech Tutoring Device" "161768" Skills: | BE,CL | ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Portable Surgery Clinic = #L "Hacked Portable Surgery Clinic" "161765" Skills: | BE,CL | ------------------------------ Hacked Pharma Tech Tutoring Device + Hacked Portable Surgery Clinic = #L "Treatment Library" "161770" Skills: | BE,CL | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Great for those extra few points of treatment when twinking. Don't forget that the Hacker tools are destroyed in the process...
